gold.user: As a developer, I want to retrieve a list of all collections in the Directus API so that I can understand the available data structures.
gold.ideal: The response should include an array of collection objects, each containing the collection name, fields, and metadata.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to create a new collection in the Directus API to store user feedback data.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the creation of the collection and return the new collection object with its details.

gold.user: As a user, I want to retrieve details of a specific collection by its ID to see its structure and fields.
gold.ideal: The response should return the collection object with its fields, types, and any associated metadata.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to update the schema of an existing collection to add a new field for user ratings.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the update and return the updated collection object with the new field included.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to delete a collection that is no longer needed to keep the API clean and organized.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the collection and indicate that it has been successfully removed.
